settings.slide_subheading: When your gut isn’t healthy, it can trigger mood changes, inhibit memory, weaken immune response, and lower energy.
settings.slide_subheading2: You can give your gut the blend of probiotics and omegas it needs with the Nouri Gut Reset.
settings.slide_heading: 90% of how you feel starts in your gut.

settings.m_hero_heading: 90% of how you feel starts in your gut.
settings.m_hero_subheading: When your gut isn’t healthy, it can trigger mood changes, inhibit memory, weaken immune response, and lower energy.  You can give your gut the blend of probiotics and omegas it needs with the Nouri Gut Reset.

settings.popup_text: Omega fatty acids such as those found in Nouri’s blend play important roles in brain development and daily function. Each Nouri capsule contains a plant-based source of Omegas 3, 6, and 9. Our first-ever combination of omegas and powerful probiotics allows your brain and gut to say “hello” to one another like never before.
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: Nouri combines researched strains of probiotics and Ahiflower oil (containing omega 3, 6 and 9 properties) to deliver the world's first unique combination targeted to reduce inflammation in your mind and body.
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: 80% of your immune activity takes place in your gut, that means that the bacteria living in your intestines are largely responsible for your immunity. To stay in tip top health requires that you feed your immune system with good, living bacteria such as the blend Nouri has created. And even better yet, the addition of Ahiflower oil provides the immune enhancing properties of EPA and DHA derived from this omega-powerhouse.
settings.popup_subtext: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

settings.popup_text: The level of energy you have on the outside all begins on the inside. The good guy bacteria living in your gut communicates with the ever-important nervous system, a main player in daily mood and energy.

settings.text:
omega - 3,6,9

Our omega oil comes from Ahiflower, a plant-based omega blend that contains GLA, an omega 6 associated with skin health, hormonal balance and reducing inflammation.

probiotic blend

Our proprietary probiotic is plant-based and contains unparalleled power, 5 diverse strains, 30BN CFU of strength guaranteed.

settings.award_text: The Nouri Proprietary seal signifies a standard of quality. Each of our products follows a simple innovation funnel: Unique. Better. Impact. We promise every product is created to be uniquely better and offers more global impact than any other product on the market.

settings.popup_text:
Nouri's blend of probiotics combined with omega oils supports your digestive system to process and absorb nutrients. By supporting the health of your digestive system everyday, your body can more easily utilize the nutrients it craves.

Probiotics are the bacteria that line your digestive track. Nouri's blend of five diverse strains of probiotics, protected and delivered to your gut by Ahiflower oil.

settings.pinpoint_text: One of the most common bacteria species in a healthy intestine.
A survivor strain, it’s strength produces it’s own antibiotics to target bad bacteria.
settings.pinpoint_bullets:
+ reduces inflammation

+ fights pathogens

+ increases immunity

settings.pinpoint_text: Breaks down waste an aids in absorption of vitamins & minerals.
Lactobacillus brevis + This strain has helps to metabolize glucose and increases cellular immunity.
settings.pinpoint_bullets:
+ immunity

+ increases effectiveness of antibiotics

+ increases BDNF

settings.pinpoint_text: Most known and studied strain, proven to help overall digestion.
settings.pinpoint_bullets:
+ digestion

+ nutrient absorption

+ repairs leaky gut

settings.pinpoint_02_text: Ahiflower oil is a pure vegan omega powerhouse with the combined nutritional punch of evening primrose, flaxseed, and fish oils! Your best omega value from a single, sustainable and traceable plant.
Unlike fish, flax, and other omega oils, Ahiflower contains GLA, an omega 6 associated with skin health, hormonal balance and reducing inflammation.

settings.heading: Nouri’s story started with a change of mind, literally.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: In your order confirmation email you will receive a tracking number. You can track your order by clicking on the unique tracking code link. And as always, you can reach out 24/7 to hello@dailynouri.com to connect with the Nouri team.

settings.question: Is this product FDA approved?
settings.answer: By law, the FDA does not approve any dietary supplements. However, the FDA does regulate dietary ingredients and supplements. All of Nouri's facilities follow Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) to ensure that Nouri's ingredients are tested and free from any yucky additives, heavy metals, microbes, or unwanted contamination.

settings.right_column_01: The Nouri Institute aims to equip consumers globally in the foundation of health. We believe in a proactive, versus reactive, approach to life.
settings.right_column_02: Our conversations and courses are being designed to provide participants worldwide with increased mental and physical health through lifestyle education.
